SELECT ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ASSETS_RENT_F F WHERE F.PRMISN_YN IS NULL OR F.PRMISN_YN = 'N' AND F.DEPTCD = #sDeptcd# ) PRMISN_YN_CNT ,( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LEV_REQEST_F L, ASSETS_RENT_F F WHERE L.PRT_AT_CODE = F.PRT_AT_CODE AND L.MNG_YEAR = F.MNG_YEAR AND L.MNG_NO = F.MNG_NO AND L.MNG_CNT = F.MNG_CNT AND F.DEPTCD = #sDeptcd# AND TO_CHAR(L.NTIC_PD_FROM,'YYYYMMDD') >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 15,'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(L.NTIC_PD_FROM,'YYYYMMDD') <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')
) NTIC_PD_CNT ,( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LEV_REQEST_F L, ASSETS_RENT_F F WHERE L.PRT_AT_CODE = F.PRT_AT_CODE AND L.MNG_YEAR = F.MNG_YEAR AND L.MNG_NO = F.MNG_NO AND L.MNG_CNT = F.MNG_CNT AND F.DEPTCD = #sDeptcd# AND L.NHT_ISUE_YN = 'Y' AND L.RCIV_SE = 'N' ) NHT_ISUE_CNT ,( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ASSETS_RENT_F F WHERE F.DEPTCD = #sDeptcd# AND TO_CHAR(F.GR_USAGE_PD_TO,'YYYYMMDD') >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 30,'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(F.GR_USAGE_PD_TO,'YYYYMMDD') <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') ) RCIV_SE_CNT FROM DUAL
